about.title: About Me
about.short: Who I am and what I bring to web & Java development.
about.description: Experienced developer with a passion for clean code and effective solutions. I focus on full-stack web applications and enterprise Java systems.
about.extra: I'm a reliable team player, always willing to go the extra mile to exceed expectations and bring innovation to every project. My know-how includes React, TailwindCSS, Spring Boot, and especially AI and machine learning, where I constantly strive to deliver real value and improve user experiences. I'm passionate about continuous learning and following the latest technologies. I believe in writing maintainable and scalable code that improves project longevity. Collaboration and clear communication are values I bring to every team. I am fluent in English and able to communicate and deliver projects internationally.

skills.title: Skills
skills.short: All modern web and backend technologies I use.
skills.description: I have a broad knowledge of modern web and backend technologies. This includes React, Vite, and TailwindCSS for building modern, responsive interfaces. I build my backend in Java and Spring Boot, where I develop scalable and secure REST APIs. I pay special attention to frontend architecture and UI/UX to make the user experience as intuitive as possible. I also have experience integrating complex systems with a focus on security, performance, and maintainability. In AI and machine learning, I strive to bring intelligent features and automation to projects to deliver real business value.
